special_text:
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an Enchantment or Island card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-1]: Tap target creature, then put two stun counters on it.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control have flying and get +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.”
